title: Bright & Sunny 2 bdr in Ravenswood. Available August 1st
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   4538 N Wolcott Unit #1B Chicago, IL 60640  Bright & Sunny, 2 bedroom located in beautiful Ravenswood  Close to the Brown Line train Montrose stop, approximately 30 minutes to Downtown. Steps from Starbucks, trendy boutiques, neighborhood restaurants and shopping.   -Living room -2 bedrooms -Eat in Kitchen - Hardwood floors throughout -Ceiling fans and all new window blinds.  -Laundry facilities in the building ***HEAT and WATER INCLUDED***  -Available August 1st -$1350.00/month -Call or Text Leana: **773*716*9300**  ***PICTURES MAY OR MAY NOT BE OF THE ACTUAL UNIT *** do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
